item.title: White House restricts media access in key area of the West Wing
item.description: The move limiting free press access to Room 140, which houses the offices of the press secretary and other staff, was said to be based on national sec...

item.title: Trump touts Lincoln Bathroom overhaul featuring marble, gold fixtures
item.description: The president unveiled the renovation project on his way to spend the weekend at his club in Mar-a-Lago as pressure mounts to reopen the government.

item.title: Nancy Mace berated airport police and TSA agents, incident report says
item.description: The report claims Mace called officers “incompetent” and accused them of mistreating her.

item.title: Trump administration must release billions in SNAP funds, judge says
item.description: Officials must act “as soon as possible,” a federal judge in Rhode Island said. A Massachusetts judge also told the administration to consider conting...

item.title: Tucker Carlson’s interview with white nationalist triggers GOP backlash
item.description: The appearance of far-right activist Nick Fuentes reopened a debate in the Republican Party over how forcefully to condemn antisemitism.
